name: apna-college-task
description: This is a sample app for DSA tracking. #### Installation -   Use Node `v20.17.0`  -   Create a `.env` file in the `server/` folder -   Add `DB_URL=mongodb+srv://xxx:xxx@cluster0.s7yvf.mongodb.net/DSA-Sheet?retryWrites=true&w=majority&appName=Cluster0` in `server/.env` file -  Update `BASE_URL` and `GUEST_CREDENTIALS` in `client/src/configurations/environment.js`

scripts.build: cd client && npm install --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
